item.title: Project 1: Sound Classification ESC10
item.description: Background: In this new era of automatization, we can make some process automatically, like recognize sound and get work on it, to deploy predictive maintenance or trigger alarms in machines. Like a rotatory machine, like rotors or bearings, o the bigger ones like hydro electric generators. So, this work is about that, classify sound into 10 different classes. I have implemented differents model and a benchmark of models to compare several algorithms to get which one is the best.
